headline: Does Realty Income's (O) European Expansion and Equity Offering Shift the Long-Term Risk Profile?
summary: On November 7, 2025, Realty Income Corporation declared its 665th consecutive monthly dividend and announced a follow-on equity offering of 150,000,000 shares through an at-the-market program, payable to shareholders of record as of November 28, 2025. Alongside its long record of steady dividends, Realty Income is accelerating capital deployment with increased investment guidance, particularly focused on European assets offering higher yields. We'll look at how Realty Income's heightened...
